title: List of concert tours by Michael Jackson and the Jackson 5
summary: The Jackson 5 are an American music group, formed in 1964 by the Jackson family brothers Jackie,  Tito, Jermaine, Marlon, and Michael.[1] The brothers first invitation to perform was in Glen Park in 1965, with other early concerts at Theodore Roosevelt College and Career Academy, Gilroy Stadium, Garyâ€™s Memorial Auditorium, Regal Theater, Chicago and Apollo Theater, Harlem in 1967.[2]
